name: holyquran
0:
”Alexa, open holy quran”
”Alexa, ask holy quran for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start holy quran”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: holy quran
des: Al Quran Free - القرآن الكريم is a genuine Islamic application to create flow in your worship time. All Muslims Quran Shareef is a free Holy Quran reading pro for a good day starts, atonement of sins and attainment of blessing. The strong connection with Qurane Kareem is the route way, leading to bestowments and Allah’s mercy. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next".
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
